result.execSummary:
Shane M. Whipple was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Shane M. Whipple was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shane M. Whipple

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Diane Caspari.  Clerk: PT
DE waives extradition and elects to return to Washington County, IL and signs waiver of extradition.  Court grants extradition and signs order.
Case trails 14-CF-24.  Status conf. 2/26/15 at 1:00 and 3/2/15 at 8:30.

Defendant Shane M. Whipple appeared with Attorney Diane R Caspari.  Defendant in custody @ KCJ.  Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Cyndi Chike.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  Matter trail 14CF24.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for October 20, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shane M. Whipple appeared with Attorney Diane R Caspari.  Defendant in custody.  Attorney Jason R Zapf, appeared for Michael Graveley, for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Cyndi Chike.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  14CF22, 14CF24, 14CM189:  Victim rights compliance.  Matter is unresolved.  Jury trial requested by the def. atty for 14CF24 and a plea hrg on 14CM189.  Court sets matter over for status on the two felony cases so Atty Graveley can be present and plea on the misd. case.  Status conference scheduled for May 30, 2014 at 10:00 am.
the 3/11/14 STC hrg has been resch'd to 4/14/14 at 3:00 pm.  Atty's & KSD notified of new date via email.

Defendant Shane M. Whipple and Attorney Diane Rose Caspari not in court. Defendant in-custody.  Prosecuting Atty Michael Graveley appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  14CF22, 14CF24, 14CM189:  No Record.  Atty Caspari out sick today and requested hrg's be resch'd.  KSD notified.

158pm  Attorney Patrick Anderson appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Diane Caspari.  Clerk: LE  Referred to Br.4 for further disposition on 3/11/14 @ 830am.  Bond continued.  kmk

Attorney Diane R Caspari in court, defendant not in court, in custody.  Attorney Jason R Zapf appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  14CF22 & 14CF24:  No Record.  Def. has picked up a new case, 14CM189, and atty's requesting these cases be set over w/new case on 2/27 before Com. Mason.  Status conference scheduled for February 27, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
the 1/14/14 Hearing has been rescheduled to 2/14/14 at 10:00 am w/def's new case, 14CF22.  Atty's & KSD notified via email.

the 1/14/14 hrg adjourned at the request of the pub def's office.  Just appointed Atty Caspari and def has other cases pending w/a court date of 1/14/14 in intake.  Hrg to be resch'd.  Def atty to notify the court of the new date.

130 p.m.  Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney K Watson.  Clk  LE.  Referred  to Br 4 for further dispo on 1/14/14 @ 830 a.m. - waiver of extradition hearing.  Bond - continued.

155pm  Attorney James Kraus appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Chuck Bennett.  Clerk: LE  Referred to Comm Mason for further disposition on 1/8/14 @ 1pm (w/new file).  $5000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  kmk
and witness list filed by the State  kmk
